statements: UPDATE sensor_data SET sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor' WHERE sensor_id = 1 AND reading_time = '2022-01-01 12:00:00'

UPDATE sensor_data SET location = 'Kitchen', sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor' WHERE sensor_id = 2 AND reading_time = '2022-05-01 10:00:00';
UPDATE sensors SET sensor_value = 10.5 WHERE sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE sensors SET sensor_name = 'Temperature Sensor' WHERE location = 'Room A';
UPDATE sensors SET sensor_value = 10.5, location = 'Room A' WHERE sensor_id = 1

UPDATE Sensors SET location='Room A', value=25.5, timestamp='2022-10-15 08:00:00' WHERE sensor_id=101
UPDATE SensorReadings SET reading_value=30.2, reading_timestamp='2023-01-20 13:30:00' WHERE reading_id=201

UPDATE SensorData SET value = 10.5, timestamp = '2022-01-10 08:30:00' WHERE sensor_id = 1;
